issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
somehow jackson 1.x is on the classpath in some ide-s ...and somehow 1.x org.codehaus jackson is being used from a dozen of classes - meanwhile the pom.xml doesn't mention it at all; but only a fasterxml's 2.9.0....

I don't know where it gets the jackson 1.x implementation; but I think it shouldn't rely on that...
fields.summary: metastore should not rely on jackson 1.x
